deployToken(string,string,bytes).details: creates a new Desoc contract using the create2 opcode

params._metadata: the cid of the metadata to be associated to the deployed Desoc contract
params._name: the name of the Desoc contract (passed to the constructor)
params._symbol: the symbol of the Desoc contract (passed to the constructor)

returns.forwarder: The address of the Forwarder contract that is being used.

params.forwarder: The address of the Forwarder contract that is being used.

returns._0: isTrustedForwarder `true` if the Forwarder is trusted to forward relayed transactions by this Recipient.

deployToken(string,string,bytes).notice: Deploy a new SBT contract to be associate to the Desci Labs factory contract

getTrustedForwarder().notice: :warning: **Warning** :warning: The Forwarder can have a full control over your Recipient. Only trust verified Forwarder.Method is not a required method to allow Recipients to trust multiple Forwarders. Not recommended yet.

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: :warning: **Warning** :warning: The Forwarder can have a full control over your Recipient. Only trust verified Forwarder.
